about.title: About Me
about.description: With a passion for both technology and design, I develop scalable, high-performance applications that captivate users and drive success.

projects.title: AI-JobPortal
projects.description: It supports two user roles (students and recruiters), enables posting jobs, applying, uploading resumes, and automatically scores how well a resume matches a job description using generative‑AI embeddings stored in a Pinecone vector database.

projects.title: Food Delivery App(HOTPOT)
projects.description: Full-stack food delivery platform with multi-role support (User, Shop Owner, Delivery Boy). Features include restaurant browsing, real-time order tracking, secure payments, and role-based dashboards — built with the MERN stack.

projects.title: AI-Powered Learning Management System
projects.description: AI-based platform that generates course layouts, topic-wise plans, and curated YouTube videos using AI. Features dynamic course structuring, personalized recommendations, and a responsive UI for a smooth learning experience.
